      • parseCategories

        private static Category parseCategories(com.google.gson.JsonObject json_categories,
                                        Category parent)
        Recursively parse a category from the given JSON tree.

        The given JsonObject should contain the following fields: name, which is a string; color, which can be parsed as a Color; subcategories, which is an array of other categories.

        Parameters:
        json_categories - a JsonObject matching the details described above
        parent - the parent category of the root of json_categories, or null
        Returns:
        a category with a complete subcategory tree from the given JSON

      • parseColor

        private static javafx.scene.paint.Color parseColor(com.google.gson.JsonObject json_color)
        Parse a Color from the given JSON object.

        The given JsonObject should contain the following fields: red; blue; green; opacity, which are all doubles. The platformPaint field, which may exist, is simply ignored.

        Parameters:
        json_color - a JsonObject matching the details described above
        Returns:
        a Color using the values from the given JSON
